entry.title: ZERO-LAUNCH Event
entry.summary: We are launching Koxy AI with zero-budget marketing...!
entry.content:
We are launching Koxy AI with zero-budget marketing...!

Why ZERO-LAUNCH ?​

There are thousands of small developers publishing great products everyday and just nobody knows about it because they don't have the require budget to advertise their products to the market. We are just trying to live in a day of this developer's life.

We recommend you check the event page

Offers​

You can upgrade your Cloudspace for free now using the zerolaunch discount code. this is a limited offer to one thousand versions. be quick and get your own free upgrade now. learn more

entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: We are glad to welcome you to Koxy AI. where you build anything in a minute, and deploy everything to the world in a second.
entry.content:
We are glad to welcome you to Koxy AI. where you build anything in a minute, and deploy everything to the world in a second.

Koxy AI is a no-code platform to build serverless globally distrubed backend with no code and zero config.

How to get started using Koxy AI ?​

First you can create an account in the platform, after that We recommend you check the documentation, It will give you a good knowledge about how things work in Koxy AI.

We are happy to have you with us in this exciting journey. this is just the start and We will be publishing more on this blog over time.
